WRITING.TEXT:
How do you dream and think? From previous experiences (I had a blind teacher in high school), it's not hard to adapt to your surroundings. How do you "see" your world?
Sorry if that's too many questions in one post.
Dude, Jamal, you never told me you were a Nigerian prince! Turns out I'm pregnant, so how would you feel about me sending $750 so I can get 60% of the cut? When can I send the moolah?
